title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1506.10 - Maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1506.10 - Maintenance

State Regulations
(a) Open containers
of volatile flammable liquids shall be prohibited in motor vehicle storage
facilities. (b) Smoking shall be
prohibited in motor vehicle storage facilities, and conspicuous durable signs
to this effect shall be displayed therein at all times. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1506.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
